- [ Media Player ](/documentation/mediaplayer)

-  stalled 

Type Property# stalled

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
static var stalled: MPMovieLoadState { get }
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieLoadState/stalled#Discussion)

The buffering of data has stalled. If started now, playback may pause automatically if the player runs out of buffered data.
